MS MCQs

    Upgrade to Teams from Skype for Business - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is true?

      You can move users to Teams all at once only if you’re upgrading from Skype for Business Online and not from Skype for Business on-premises.

      You can move users to Teams all at once if you’re upgrading from either Skype for Business Online or Skype for Business on-premises.

      You can move users to Teams in stages only if you’re upgrading from Skype for Business on-premises.


    2. Choose the recommended path for Skype for Business Online customers.

      Start with the Skype for Business Only mode, and then move to TeamsOnly.

      Start with the default Islands mode, and then move to TeamsOnly.

      Start with the Meetings First mode, and then move to TeamsOnly.


    3. Which of the following statements accurately describes the Azure AD Connect requirements?

      Azure AD Connect is required to synchronize on-premises and online directories. It’s required for on-premises deployments only.

      Azure AD Connect is required to synchronize on-premises and online directories. It’s required for online deployments only.

      Azure AD Connect is required to synchronize on-premises and online directories. It’s required for hybrid environments only.
